snippet: Two new picture books explore the complexities of expressing and returning romantic affection.
An analysis of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority’s budget said that the authority was in appreciably better fiscal condition than in recent years but that risks remained.
abstract: New York State Comptroller's analysis concludes that the Metropolitan Transportation Authority's finances have improved appreciably, but that risks remain; says the authority has benefited from ridership growth as a result of regional job gains, but is vulnerable to the pace of economic recovery, looming round of collective bargaining and litigation challenging the constitutionality of its largest source of tax revenue.

headline.main: At M.T.A., State Comptroller Finds Improved Fiscal Health
headline.print_headline: At M.T.A., State Comptroller Finds Improved Fiscal Health

snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes a new claim that Microsoft is working on its own cellphone, two rivals wanting a deal like the ones the Kansas ...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes a new claim that Microsoft is working on its own cellphone, two rivals wanting a deal like the ones the Kansas Cities gave Google and the Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen's take on Windows 8.

snippet: Deutsche Telekom would merge MetroPCS with its T-Mobile USA unit, as the German company seeks to bolster its flagging business in the United States.
abstract: Deutsche Telekom would merge MetroPCS with its T-Mobile USA unit, as the German company seeks to bolster its flagging business in the United States.

snippet: Nest, the company founded by the former Apple designer Tony Fadell, has a new version of its self-learning thermostat coming out this month. The company said it had upgraded both the hardware and software of the device to make it thinner, smarter ...
abstract: Nest, the company founded by the former Apple designer Tony Fadell, has a new version of its self-learning thermostat coming out this month. The company said it had upgraded both the hardware and software of the device to make it thinner, smarter and more compatible with different heating and cooling systems.

headline.main: Nest, the High-Tech Thermostat, Gets Slimmer and Smarter

snippet: The 13th annual report from Interbrand ranks what it deems the 100 most valuable brands worldwide, and Coca-Cola, Apple, I.B.M. and Google lead the list.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes 13th annual report from Interbrand ranks what it deems the 100 most valuable brands worldwide, and Coca-Cola, Apple, IBM and Google lead the list.

headline.main: List of Global Brands Keeps Coke on Top, and Apple Jumps Up
